mapper.sql: t.prop_id, t.prop_type, t.obj_id, t.resume, t.status, t.link_url, t.link_img, t.modifier,t.title, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, DATE_FORMAT(t.modify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modify_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_prop_index
prop_type,
obj_id,
resume,
status,
link_url,
link_img,
modifier,
create_time, modify_time
#{propType},
#{objId},
#{resume},
#{status},
#{linkUrl},
#{linkImg},
#{modifier},
NOW(), NOW()
mapper.update:
update t_prop_index
prop_type=#{propType},
link_img = #{linkImg},
link_url = #{linkUrl},
obj_id=#{objId},
status = #{status},
modifier = #{modifier},
modify_time = NOW() where prop_id = #{propId}
mapper.delete: update t_prop_index set status = 0 where prop_id = #{propId}
